name: SPOC_COMM_SENT
description: This table contains information about communication sent for a plan of care.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the plan of care record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: COMM_SENT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The communication type category ID for the plan of care.

columns.name: COMM_SENT_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the date the communication was sent

columns.name: COMM_SENT_PROV_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the provider who received the communication for the plan of care.

columns.name: LETTER_SENT_JOB
columns.description: Stores the Job ID of the letter communication sent

columns.name: LETTER_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number of the patient encounter in which the letter was sent.

columns.name: SENT_COMM_CMT
columns.description: The comment associated with the communication sent for the plan of care.

columns.name: SENT_COMM_USER_ID
columns.description: Stores the user who sent the communication.

columns.name: SENT_COMM_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
